name: XJ Beauty - Barrier Repair 2.0 OEM Innovation
description: XJ Beauty offers Barrier Repair 2.0 OEM Innovation - next generation barrier repair skincare with biotech solutions. Comprehensive formulation development incorporating ceramides, peptides, and microbiome support. Advanced barrier repair formulations combining traditional lipid systems with cutting-edge biotechnology. OEM/Contract manufacturing services for innovative barrier repair products.
notes: Next generation barrier repair with biotech OEM solutions. Barrier Repair 2.0 combines ceramides, peptides, and microbiome support. Advanced formulation development beyond traditional lipid systems. Comprehensive OEM/Contract manufacturing for innovative barrier repair products. Cutting-edge approach to barrier repair science.
